article_title: ACA's Mandate To Buy Coverage May Be GOP-Friendly

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Whether it’s a penalty to pick a drug plan under Medicare or the new Republican proposal to replace the Affordable Care Act or the President’s health law alone, penalties abound for being uninsured. A new analysis by the Urban Institute said “individual responsibility” requirements akin to the controversial individual mandate included [...]
